viewData.name: MSI 15.6" GL63 Notebook
viewData.short_description: Buy MSI 15.6" GL63 Notebook featuring 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H Six-Core, 16GB DDR4 | 128GB M.2 SSD + 1TB HDD 15.6" 1920 x 1080 eDP IPS-Level Display. Review MSI
viewData.long_description: The 15.6" GL63 Notebook from MSI is a gaming-focused laptop designed for on-the-go users. Specs-wise, it's powered by a 3.9 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H six-core processor, 16GB of 2400 MHz DDR4 RAM, and an NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 graphics card. Thanks to its dedicated GPU, you can play graphically demanding games on its 1920 x 1080 Full HD display. Moreover, it has HDMI and mini DisplayPort outputs for you to connect larger external displays.  For storage, it's equipped with a 128GB M.2 SSD and a 1TB 7200 rpm HDD. Should you need more room, you can attach additional storage solutions using its multiple USB ports as well as its SDXC media card reader. Other integrated features include 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Gigabit LAN, Bluetooth 5.0, a backlit keyboard, a webcam, a microphone, speakers, and audio jacks. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Home (64-Bit).
